name: Michael Connelly-Novels Quiz | Michael Connelly | 10 Questions

questions.text: A dead Hollywood producer looks like a Mafia hit. Harry gets together with old flame Eleanor Wish.
questions.explanation:
Trunk Music.

	'Trunk Music' is another name for a Mafioso's favorite form of body disposal.

questions.text: Terry McCaleb, ex-FBI agent and heart transplant recipient, tracks down the killer who murdered his heart donor.
questions.explanation:
Blood Work.

	This novel was made into a movie (very different from the book) starring Clint Eastwood.

questions.text: A prominent black civil rights lawyer is killed on a small passenger train - and it looks like the work of the LAPD.
questions.explanation:
Angels Flight.

	The lawyer, Howard Elias, had brought many cases against the LAPD. 'Angels Flight' is the name of the train.

questions.text: A serial killer seems to be stalking both children and the detectives investigating the murders of the children.
questions.explanation:
The Poet.

	The killer was called 'The Poet' because of Edgar Allen Poe quotes left at the crime scenes.

questions.text: Harry investigates the 30-year-old murder of his prostitute mother.
questions.explanation:
The Last Coyote.

	Harry strikes up a relationship with a wild coyote in the canyon below his house. He thinks that they are a lot alike.

questions.text: Cassie Black performs a daring theft in Las Vegas then suffers the consequences - a singleminded killer stalking her to reclaim the cash.
questions.explanation:
Void Moon.

	The 'void moon' is an astrological portent of disaster.

questions.text: Harry Bosch stalks a killer whose work resembles that of the Dollmaker - a criminal supposedly killed by Bosch three years previously.
questions.explanation:
The Concrete Blonde.

	This is another novel featuring a serial killer - a frequent theme in Connelly's work.

questions.text: Harry confronts a cop killer who is involved in the drug trade in Mexicali and Los Angeles.
questions.explanation:
The Black Ice.

	'Black ice' is the drug that is being manufactured.

questions.text: A Vietnam war buddy of Harry's is murdered, and Harry sets out to find the killer.
questions.explanation:
The Black Echo.

	This was Michael Connelly's first book.

questions.text: Scheduled to be released in January, 2001, this book brings together Harry Bosch and Terry McCaleb to solve a case.
questions.explanation:
A Darkness More than Night.

	McCaleb suspects Bosch of being the villain.
